column4: is there any one having 12.04 and facing with Fn key functionality has been reverted like fn+f11 suppose to mute as a media key but fn+11 is making full screen and f11 is muting?
I didn't notice anything such as this but you might want to add packages related to laptop configurations : have you looked in Synaptic, or in the Applications Center ?
just type in console "apt-cache search laptop", it will pull in a list with descriptions, then it should be enough self-explanatory
